name: Quetzal
headline: Simple, LLM-first translation and internationalization for software
description: Quetzal is the first fully LLM-powered translation and internationalization suite, enabling companies to translate and internationalize their software and content instantly with minimal setup. We also handle all of your internationalization issues, from managing all of your stakeholders to bringing your product and marketing to market. No more waiting days or even weeks for translated content! Deliver a perfect experience to your users in any language, instantly.

founders.name: John Thompson, Founder
founders.description: Former SWE at Slack, working to make software internationalization as easy and painless as possible

founders.name: Brendan Agliardo, Founder
founders.description: Founder of Quetzal, former SWE at Mercatalyst, UMD CS dropout

# Translate your product instantly.
We help you get new customers who speak any language by giving you the tools to internationalize your whole product in minutes, not months.
Start Installing
or do it manually via [our docs](https://getquetzal.com/<https:/quetzal.mintlify.app/getting-started>)
Your browser does not support the video tag.
Backed by[](https://getquetzal.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/>)
## Internationalize in minutes
Simply sign up, install our package, and use our VSCode extension which intelligently finds all of your user-facing text and gets you translating ASAP.
  * 20+ languages supported
  * Compatible with Next.js and React
  * Quick setup flow that takes ~10 minutes


![Feature 1](https://getquetzal.com/_next/static/media/feature-1.dfbbcc40.svg)
![Feature 2](https://getquetzal.com/_next/static/media/feature-2.733ad2d9.svg)
## Instant translation
No more waiting for days for your translations to be done. We leverage the power of AI to take your text along with the context of your application to achieve the best possible translation within minutes.
  * Accurate translations, in context
  * On every build, detects and translates new strings
  * Automatically detects the user‚Äôs browser locale"


## Easily monitor your status
Our dashboard lets you see and manage all your strings, all in one place.
  * See your current locales and add more
  * See how every string got translated
  * Add specific lingo for consistency across your product


![Feature 3](https://getquetzal.com/_next/static/media/feature-3.42345be2.svg)
## Designed for businesses like yours
Quetzal has flexible pricing to make your internationalization as affordable and as easy as possible.
### Starter
Best option for personal use & for your next project.
$0/month
  * 1 project
  * Build-time translation
  * VSCode extension for easy integration
  * Team size: 1 user
  * Translated locales: 1
  * Number of tokens
On the free tier, you may be subject to rate limiting for excessive usage.
: Unlimited
  * Support: Email

Get started
### Business
Perfect for your small business with multiple developers.
$50/monthper locale
  * 1 project
  * Build-time translation
  * VSCode extension for easy integration
  * Team size: 10 users
  * Translated locales: $50/locale
  * Number of tokens: Unlimited
  * Support: M-F 9am-5pm PT Slack & Email

Get started
### Enterprise
Best for large scale uses and customers all over the world.
Contact us
  * Unlimited projects
  * Build-time translation
  * VSCode extension for easy integration
  * Team size: 11+ users
  * Translated languages: Unlimited
  * Number of tokens: Unlimited
  * Support: 24/7 Slack, Phone & Email

Contact us
## Get started internationalizing today
We have a generous free plan, letting you get started without worrying about paying until you add a second language.
Sign up

generated_description:
**Quetzal: Revolutionizing Translation and Internationalization**

Founded in 2024, Quetzal is on a mission to simplify the complex world of translation and internationalization for software developers. Based in Oakland, California, and part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, Quetzal is the first fully LLM (Large Language Model) powered translation suite that promises instant multilingual support with minimal setup.

### What They Do
Quetzal's core offering is a translation and internationalization suite that allows companies to deliver their software and content in multiple languages at lightning speed‚Äîthink minutes, not weeks. With a focus on user experience, Quetzal intelligently captures user-facing text via a VSCode extension and translates it while keeping context in mind. It supports over 20 languages and is compatible with popular frameworks such as Next.js and React.

**Key Features:**
- **Instant Translations**: Leveraging AI, Quetzal provides accurate translations that maintain the original context.
- **Monitor and Manage**: Their dashboard offers a complete view of all translations, allowing for easy management of languages and strings.
- **Flexible Pricing**: Quetzal is designed for all, ranging from individuals to large enterprises, with plans that cater to various budgets.

### Pricing Plans
1. **Starter**: Free for personal use, limited to one project.
2. **Business**: $50/month per locale, ideal for small teams.
3. **Enterprise**: Custom pricing for larger organizations, featuring unlimited projects and 24/7 support.

### The Takeaway
Quetzal's approach reduces the typical friction associated with internationalization processes. Their goal is straightforward: making it possible for businesses to connect with users in any language, effortlessly and efficiently. With a lean team of 2 and a strong backing from Y Combinator, they're poised to make a significant impact in the software localization space.

For more information, check out [Quetzal's website](https://getquetzal.com/) and get started on your internationalization journey today. If you have inquiries, their founders are just an email away at founders@getquetzal.com.
